pageProduct.name: OGX Extra Strength Coconut Miracle Oil Penetrating Oil 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OGX Coconut Miracle Oil Extra Strength Penetrating Oil is an ultra-rich repairing hair oil with coconut oil, essence of tiare and vanilla bean extract that helps repair, soften and revive strands. A leave in hair oil for dry hair.

OGX Damage Remedy+ Coconut Miracle Oil Extra Strength Penetrating Oil

This penetrating hair oil is the key to your island escape, to help revive your senses and your strands. This rich oil helps to calm frizz and tame flyaways, leaving hair silky soft and shiny.
Drench dry, damaged strands with the secret of Maui. This ultra-rich repairing blend with coconut oil, essence of tiare and vanilla bean extract helps to repair, soften and revive strands. Discover silky, soft, island-girl hair.



  • Hydrating hair oil for dry hair

  • Smoothes hair and tames frizz for softer, shinier tresses

  • Apply to damp hair and leave in

Size: 100mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Penetrating Hair Oil
• Extra Strength Coconut Miracle Oil
• Soften & Revive Strands


Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately.

Ingredients

Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Dimethiconol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Gardenia Tahitensis (Tiare) Flower Extract, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Water (Aqua), Fragrance (Parfum).

Directions

Pour a small amount into palm, smooth over palms then spread evenly onto clean, towel dried hair working through to ends. Do not rinse. Style as usual. For best results use in conjunction with other OGX products.
